channel.title: network on Bucket's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in network on Bucket's Notes

item.title: working with ssh
item.description: scp (-i [key]) [source] [destination] remote location will need user@ip:/PATH ssh (-i [key]) [user@ip] key generation ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -f ~/.ssh/[name of key] cat [name of key].pub | nc [host] [port]
